title: File Sharing
description: Easily upload and share your files with end-to-end encryption, ensuring complete data security.

title: Store Files
description: Store large files securely and access them from any device, anytime, with ease.

title: Access Files Anytime, Anywhere
description: Access your files from any location and share them with users or through public links securely.

title: Secure Files
description: Track file modifications and revert to previous versions when necessary, keeping your files protected.

title: Shared Files History
description: View and manage the history of shared files, enabling easy collaboration with teammates.
